MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH3 postcode Edinburgh. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6pm to repair faulty electrical equipment located at Rosemount buildings and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6pm, Thursday, 10th December 2020.
